name: SACRED SEED
description:
HTML VERSION ONLY WORKS IN FULL SCREEN MODE

You have one goal, reach the top and let the flower bloom. In the catacombs, nothing has grown in years. but after finding a discarded seed, a sappling emerged. With that brought hope. Traverse upwards to the sun to plant the sacred seed so life can be restored.

This is our submission for the Spring Game Jammin' Game Jam April 4 2021.

All assets used were created for this game including art, audio, and scripts.

Credits:
- Programming: Zach Howard & DogSplat
- Audio: Zach Howard & Alishia Pettigrew
- Art: DogSplat
